statement.p: If a right triangle has legs of length \displaystyle{a}={14} and \displaystyle{b}={25}, what are the angles

solution.p: For angle \displaystyle{A} the opposite side has length \displaystyle{a}={14} and the adjacent side has length \displaystyle{b}={25}. The angle is therefore
For angle \displaystyle{B} the opposite side has length \displaystyle{b}={25} and the adjacent side has length \displaystyle{a}={14}. The angle is therefore
